titles.title: A bill for the relief of Frederick Paul of Seattle, Washington.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 4/9/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay an unspecified sum to a named individual in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States arising from legal services performed by such individual on behalf of Arctic Slope Eskimos and other Alaska Natives in connection with the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act.
